reference_summary:
{'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Richard Standeven'], 'Producers': ['Gub Neal'], 'Starring': ['Robbie Coltrane', 'Ricky Tomlinson', 'Dennis Philby'], 'Studio': ['Acorn Media']} Right in line with others in this series. Great writing and great acting. A vintage retrospective look at British Hong Kong at the time of the handover to China also. Crime in Hong Kong {'Subtitles': ['None available'], 'Directors': ['Antonia Bird'], 'Producers': ['ITV'], 'Starring': ['Robbie Coltrane', 'Barbara Flynn', 'Geraldine Somerville'], 'Studio': ['Acorn TV']} This story is that of a British vet with 3 tours in Ulster under its belt. He has lost mates and is suffering from PTSD. The anti-American comments and moments are from his point of view. As Fitz says, understandable but not justified. I find the other reviewers a bit thin skinned. If they had complained about the believability of the vet going off the rails, that would have been more valid in my opinion. Not that bloody awful if you watch the whole thing {'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['David Carson', 'Michael Grossman', 'Michael Robison', 'Jim Contner'], 'Producers': ['David Simkins', 'Robert Hewitt Wolfe', 'Nicolas Cage'], 'Starring': ['Paul Blackthorne', 'Valerie Cruz', 'Terrence Mann'], 'Studio': ['Lionsgate']} If you read and loved the books, you are likely to be disappointed. But if you view this series with fresh eyes and without preconceptions, it's quite good. Settle back and enjoy! Take it as a fresh look {'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Dan Reed', 'Marc Jobst', 'Sarah Harding'], 'Producers': ['Chris Burt', 'Damien Timmer', 'Kate McKerrell', 'Michele Buck', 'Rebecca Eaton', 'Ted Childs'], 'Starring': ['Clare Holman', 'Kevin Whately', 'Laurence Fox'], 'Studio': ['PBS']} If you liked Morse and Lewis, you will like Lewis and Hathaway. Lewis has grown since his time with Morse and following the death of his wife. Hathaway as the erstwhile Cambridge theologian is a wonderful foil to Lewis. Enjoy! Murders in Oxford---or Shades of Morse Dr.Who Xmas Specials (Giftset/BD) Various (Actor, Director) Format: Blu-ray Movies & TV, Blu-ray, Movies ['AMAZON EXCLUSIVE GIFTSET WITH BLUETOOTH SPEAKER:', 'Doctor Who: Christmas Specials Giftset with TARDIS Speakers [Blu-ray]', 'For the first time on one complete set, own every Christmas special from the new generation of Doctor Who. David Tennant, Matt Smith and Peter Capaldi all take starring turns in eleven exhilarating Christmas specials that set the Doctor rushing to save the world from an array of dastardly foes including the Master, the Cybermen and even Santa Clause himself.', 'Set includes the following:', '11 Doctor Who Christmas Specials', '(3 discs):', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0 THE CHRISTMAS INVASION', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0 THE RUNAWAY BRIDE', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0 VOYAGE OF THE DAMNED', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0 THE NEXT DOCTOR', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0 THE END OF TIME, PART ONE', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0 THE END OF TIME, PART TWO', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0 A CHRISTMAS CAROL', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0 THE DOCTOR, THE WIDOW, AND THE WARDROBE', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0 THE SNOWMEN', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0 THE TIME OF THE DOCTOR', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0 LAST CHRISTMAS', 'TARDIS Bluetooth Speaker', "This Doctor Who TARDIS Wireless Bluetooth Speaker will seamlessly pair with most any Bluetooth device. It features meticulous craftsmanship and incredible sound quality, making it highly desirable to collectors and audiophiles alike. The easy-to-use interface allows for an array of control options, while LED indicators let you know when you power the device on and when you're connected.", 'Features:', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0 Sound clips include Materialize, Dematerialize, Cloister Bell, Flight, and Turbulence!', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0 Top LED flashes and the Police Box sign illuminates! Perfect for Doctor Who collectors and audiophiles alike. Wireless Doctor Who speakers!', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0 Made of super-rigid ABS', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0 The Police Box sign illuminates when connected to a device.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0 Auxiliary In/Out for linking multiple models together for surround sound', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0 Built-in omnidirectional microphone for phone calls with noise cancellation', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0 Multifunction interface for Volume / Play / Pause / >> /', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0 Battery indicator display / voice battery low indicator', 'Specifications:', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0 3 1/2-foot 3.5 mm auxiliary cable and 3-foot micro USB charging cable included', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0 Connectivity: wireless Bluetooth or 3.5 mm auxiliary', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0 Wireless range: 33 feet / 10 meters', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0 Battery: 10-hour life via rechargeable lithium-ion', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0 Speakers: 2-inch high-power and 2 1/2-inch passive bass radiator', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0 USB-rechargeable lithium-ion battery', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0 TARDIS measures about 8 1/2-inches tall x 4 2/5-inches wide x 4 2/5-inches long.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0 For ages 6 and up.'] {'Product Dimensions': '0.7 x 7.5 x 5.4 inches; 1.1 Pounds', 'Item model number': '43382038', 'Director': 'Various', 'Media Format': 'Blu-ray, NTSC', 'Run time': '9 hours', 'Release date': 'November 24, 2015', 'Actors': 'Various', 'Studio': 'BBC', 'Number of discs': '3'} I love the Tardis speaker. It charges quickly with the USB cable. The instructions say it should be able to hook up with your computer if attached by the USB cable, but I have only been able to get it to connect to my aging 2008 MacBook Pro by using the Bluetooth connection. It pairs excellently with my iPhone and iPad also. A total treat for this Whovian.

In a comment to another post I listed all the episodes included in the three disk set, and I am repeating this info below as it is not included in the item information by Amazon. I am giving this only 4 stars because the DVD set arrived with the middle piece to one of the DVD holders half broken, making it impossible to securely stow one of them when not in use. All three DVD's were loose in the case on arrival but fortunately not scratched and all played well.

Tenth Doctor David Tennant specials---
The Christmas Invasion
The Runaway Bride
Voyage of the Damned
The Next Doctor
The End Of Time, Part One
The End Of Time, Part Two

Eleventh Doctor Matt Smith specials--
A Christmas Carol
The Doctor, the Widow and the Wardrobe
The Snowmen
The Time of the Doctor

Twelfth Doctor Peter Capaldi special--
Last Christmas

There is also a bonus feature called Ten Christmases: "in this exclusive new feature Rufus Hound is on a mission to discover what makes a Doctor Who Christmas Special so special!" Super gift for your favorite Whovian The Dish Rob Sitch (Director), Sam Neill (Actor), Kevin Harrington (Actor) & 0 more Rated: PG-13 Format: DVD Movies & TV, Studio Specials, Warner Home Video, All Titles ['It\'s the biggest event since sheep invented wool! Apollo 11\'s astronauts will walk on the moon -- and the 1,000-ton satellite dish in tiny, sheep-farming Parkes, Australia, will beam that historic first step around the globe. But as giddy citizens prepare for the moment when the entire world will depend on them, the dish flatlines. And its unconventional Aussie crew and its by-the-book NASA supervisor from the U.S. have very different ideas about how to fix it. A culture clash of cosmic proportions erupts in this fact-based tale of how the biggest televised event in history was almost not televised. The Dish, with Sam Neill (Jurassic Park), Patrick Warburton (Seinfeld) and others in a skilled ensemble portraying a spirited array of techies and townies, "will send you to the moon and back laughing" (Bruce Kirkland, Toronto Sun).'] {'Genre': 'Comedy', 'Format': 'NTSC', 'Contributor': 'Patrick Warburton, Rob Sitch, Genevieve Mooy, Lenka Kripac, Eliza Szonert, Sam Neill, Bille Brown, Matthew Moore, Andrew S. Gilbert, Roy Billing, Kevin Harrington, Tom Long, Tayler Kane, John McmartinPatrick Warburton, Rob Sitch, Genevieve Mooy, Lenka Kripac, Eliza Szonert, Sam Neill, Bille Brown, Matthew Moore, Andrew S. Gilbert, Roy Billing, Kevin Harrington, Tom Long, Tayler Kane, John Mcmartin See more', 'Language': 'English', 'Runtime': '1 hour and 41 minutes', 'Aspect Ratio': '1.33:1', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'MPAA rating': 'PG-13 (Parents Strongly Cautioned)', 'Product Dimensions': '7.5 x 5.5 x 0.5 inches; 0.01 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'WARA667702DVD', 'Director': 'Rob Sitch', 'Media Format': 'NTSC', 'Run time': '1 hour and 41 minutes', 'Release date': 'November 6, 2012', 'Actors': 'Sam Neill, Kevin Harrington, Tom Long, Patrick Warburton, Genevieve Mooy', 'Studio': 'Warner Archive', 'Country of Origin': 'USA', 'Number of discs': '1'} I have loved this movie since my first viewing in a theater. Based on the true story of how the television signal made it from the moon to all those TV sets worldwide back in July 1969 -- thanks to a wonderful facility in Parkes, Australia. Get ready to enjoy a story where the geeks are also the heroes! Excellent Apollo 11 story from a different viewpoint Eureka Gesamtbox [Blu-ray] Salli Richardson-Whitfield (Actor), Colin Ferguson (Actor) Rated: Unrated Format: Blu-ray Movies & TV, Featured Categories, Blu-ray, Drama ["Eureka is a seemingly ordinary place whose residents lead ordinary lives...at least to the naked eye. Shrouded in secrecy, the picturesque town is actually a community of scientific geniuses secretly relocated by the government to conduct top-secret research. This hit series smartly roots itself in reality, as the drama of the townsfolk stems from life's myriad of everyday challenges. But with the population's unique talents, troubled psyches and limitless resources, these small-town concerns have a way of becoming big-time problems. It is at that intersection, where human frailty and super-science collide - that Eureka begins. Let this Complete Series Collection take you to another place as you watch every episode from each of the five seasons, back-to-back and uninterrupted!"] {'Genre': 'Drama', 'Format': 'Blu-ray, DVD', 'Contributor': 'Colin Ferguson, Salli Richardson-Whitfield', 'Language': 'English', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'MPAA rating': 'Unrated (Not Rated)', 'Product Dimensions': '5.47 x 2.8 x 6.89 inches; 1.47 Pounds', 'Item model number': '5053083001292', 'Media Format': 'Blu-ray, DVD', 'Release date': 'October 16, 2014', 'Actors': 'Salli Richardson-Whitfield, Colin Ferguson', 'Subtitles': 'English, French, German', 'Studio': 'Universal Pictures', 'Number of discs': '18'} I loved this series and missed the release of the DVD version, so I was really happy to find this region free BluRay edition. It is from Germany and comes with a choice not only audio tracks in your choice of English, French, and German, but also visual subtitles that can be selected separately from the audio, that is you can watch with English audio but have subtitles in German or French or English (or none at all). And it plays great on my Sony US BluRay DVD player.

Comes as a set of 18 disks with bonus materials. If you would like a great series packaged in a great set, buy this one!

Note that this takes a long while for delivery (made it two days after its latest predicted arrival) as it is sold by a third party and is shipped from Germany. EUREKA!!!! Great set of DVD's! Tin Man (Two-Disc Collector's Edition) [Blu-ray] Alan Cumming (Actor), Nick Willing (Director) Rated: Unrated Format: Blu-ray Movies & TV, Blu-ray, TV {'Format': 'Multiple Formats, AC-3, Blu-ray, Dolby, NTSC, Widescreen', 'Contributor': 'Nick Willing, Zoey Deschanel, Alan Cumming', 'Language': 'English', 'Number Of Discs': '2', 'Publication Date': 'July 20, 2010', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'MPAA rating': 'Unrated (Not Rated)', 'Product Dimensions': '6.5 x 5.25 x 0.5 inches; 3.2 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'MCMBRRH2763', 'Director': 'Nick Willing', 'Media Format': 'Multiple Formats, AC-3, Blu-ray, Dolby, NTSC, Widescreen', 'Release date': 'July 20, 2010', 'Actors': 'Alan Cumming', 'Studio': 'Rhi Entertainment', 'Number of discs': '2'} Wonderful movie I have enjoyed for years. And this one has subtitles! Off to the O.Z.!
profile:
**User Summary:**

- **Content Preference:** The user continues to enjoy high-quality writing and compelling performances in films and series, particularly those with historical or cultural themes. Their enthusiasm for comedic yet insightful narratives, especially those based on true stories, remains evident. The recent acquisition of a well-regarded collector's edition highlights their commitment to innovative storytelling that merges entertainment with intellectual engagement.

- **Geographic Interest:** The user’s appreciation for British culture and narratives related to Hong Kong's history remains strong, now supplemented by an increasing interest in Australian culture. This diversification of cultural narratives is reflected in their latest media purchases.

- **Rating Pattern:** Their average rating continues to hover around 4.4, with a recent perfect score of 5.0 suggesting a deep appreciation for quality productions that align with their tastes, showcasing their nuanced understanding of storytelling.

- **Language and Accessibility:** The user prefers English-language content with closed captions, underlining their focus on accessibility and comprehension in their viewing choices.

- **Cultural Insight:** Valuing detailed analyses of historical events and cultural phenomena, the user maintains a critical lens toward the integrity of storytelling, while remaining receptive to various viewpoints.

Overall, the user is drawn to diverse and thoughtfully crafted content that intertwines captivating narratives with cultural or historical insights, reinforcing their passion for beloved themes and characters.
